languages.text: "Личный законник на побегушках мне не помешает. Будешь у меня в долгу".
"I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."
languages.original_text: "Личный законник на побегушках мне не помешает. Будешь у меня в долгу".

traits.locale_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call. Especially one who is in my debt."
"I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call. Especially one who is in my debt."
"I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."
"I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."
"I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."
"I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

languages.text: "Ich hätte gerne einen persönlichen Gesetzeshüter, der nach meiner Pfeife tanzt ... vor allem, wenn er in meiner Schuld steht."
languages.original_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte gerne einen persönlichen Gesetzeshüter, der nach meiner Pfeife tanzt ... vor allem, wenn er in meiner Schuld steht."

languages.text: « Je n'aurais rien contre avoir un représentant de l'ordre à ma disposition. En particulier s'il est mon débiteur. »
languages.original_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais rien contre avoir un représentant de l'ordre à ma disposition. En particulier s'il est mon débiteur. »

languages.text: «Me vendría muy bien contar con un agente de la ley a mi disposición; sobre todo si está en deuda conmigo».
languages.original_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

traits.locale_text: «Me vendría muy bien contar con un agente de la ley a mi disposición; sobre todo si está en deuda conmigo».

languages.text: “能有个执法者对我唯命是从，尤其还是个欠了我人情的执法者，这还挺不错的。”
languages.original_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

traits.locale_text: “能有个执法者对我唯命是从，尤其还是个欠了我人情的执法者，这还挺不错的。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の言いなりになる私用の法執行官がいれば助かる。恩義を感じている者なら、なおさら好都合だ」
languages.original_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の言いなりになる私用の法執行官がいれば助かる。恩義を感じている者なら、なおさら好都合だ」

languages.text: "Elimin altında şahsıma ait bir kanuncunun bulunması işime yarayabilir. Özellikle de bana minnet borcu varsa."
languages.original_text: "I could use a personal lawman at my beck and call — especially one who is in my debt."

traits.locale_text: "Elimin altında şahsıma ait bir kanuncunun bulunması işime yarayabilir. Özellikle de bana minnet borcu varsa."
